Articles.Content:
The animated cinematics contain animated kerbal rigs that I can't find any way to get my hands on. I'd model my own, but I'm not good at 3d modeling. I know others have modeled their own, but are there official Kerbal Animation rigs available/ will they be available in the future?

**Like this one?**

![New_eva.jpg](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/e/e3/New_eva.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T12:18:33Z" title="05/02/2015 12:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by KasperVld**
  
minor language correction
As far as I know these won't be publically available.
I'd make one, but these days thats the kinda work Im paid to do ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

As I recall someone ripped the ingame suit+Kerbal (who is technically a part) from the dll and used the blender .mu to .whatever\_you\_want converter and uploaded it to sketchfab, you could find that... or you could find the paper Kerbal instructions (the guy there shows you how to get the models and textures from the game)...

But then to have cinematic models, you would have to either modify the in-game version or make your own....
